EmailTemplate.name: Turbonomic Discount offer (1495718765.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic Discount offer (1495718765.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 98 Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Edward, I’m reaching out with a special offer for educational organizations as we approach the summer months. I’ve worked with a number of EDU’s including Boston College <[[https://turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic-BostonCollege-Success-Story.pdf]]>, Northeastern University <[[https://www.techvalidate.com/product-research/turbonomic/case-studies/6BD-C39-C87]]>, Princeton University <[[https://www.techvalidate.com/product-research/turbonomic/case-studies/9F0-CAC-B7B]]>, Penn State etc. to alleviate their IT management challenges. They generally run within a July-June budget cycle and occasionally have remaining funds towards the end of their fiscal year. I typically find these customers bear one of two prevalent problems:1. Their IT environments are highly fragmented, marked by high inefficiency and/or2. Their staff is limited, thinly spread and under-resourced. Turbonomic directly addresses both of these challenges. With that in mind, we’d like to offer a $15,000 discount for any deal with us, if you install Turbonomic’s autonomic performance platform before mid June. You can find the free 30-day trial here <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/external-link.jspa?url=https%3A%2F%2Fturbonomic.com%2Fdownloads%2Fturbonomic-30-day-trial%2F]]> or by visiting turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial/. I hope to connect in the coming weeks to discuss Turbo and the different use cases that EDU customers have seen an immediate ROI. Best,Katie Katie NorchiSales Development RepresentativeO: 857.305.4618 C: 440.708.8477500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
